stats-table.heading: School enrolment, primary (gross), gender parity index (GPI); public and private schools
stats-table.units: ratio of girls to boys; index less than 1 suggests girls are more disadvantaged than boys in learning opportunities, index greater than 1 suggests the reverse

country-stats.name: Kosovo
country-stats.footnote: Declared independence from Serbia in February 2008.

country-stats.name: Russian Federation
country-stats.footnote: Excluding the Republic of Crimea and Sevastopol City (admitted to the Russian Federation in March 2014).

country-stats.name: Ukraine
country-stats.footnote: Including the Republic of Crimea and Sevastopol City (admitted to the Russian Federation in March 2014).
